event.description: Donnie Murphy flies out to center fielder Jon Jay.
Aaron Rowand strikes out swinging.
Hanley Ramirez grounds out, second baseman Tyler Greene to first baseman Matt Adams.
Giancarlo Stanton grounds out, shortstop Alex Cora to first baseman Matt Adams.
Greg Dobbs homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Gaby Sanchez strikes out swinging.
Bryan Petersen lines out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Pitcher Change: Brandon Dickson replaces Kyle Lohse.
John Buck flies out to right fielder Skip Schumaker.
Nick Green strikes out swinging.
Donnie Murphy lines out to shortstop Alex Cora.
Defensive Substitution: Adron Chambers replaces left fielder Matt Holliday, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Aaron Rowand flies out to right fielder Skip Schumaker.
Hanley Ramirez singles on a soft ground ball to pitcher Brandon Dickson.
Giancarlo Stanton singles on a ground ball to left fielder Adron Chambers. Hanley Ramirez to 2nd.
Greg Dobbs doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Skip Schumaker. Hanley Ramirez scores. Giancarlo Stanton scores.
Gaby Sanchez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Skip Schumaker. Greg Dobbs scores.
Bryan Petersen strikes out swinging.
John Buck grounds out sharply, pitcher Brandon Dickson to catcher Yadier Molina to first baseman Matt Adams.
Pitcher Change: Trevor Rosenthal replaces Brandon Dickson.
Nick Green grounds out, second baseman Tyler Greene to first baseman Matt Adams.
Donnie Murphy singles on a line drive to left fielder Adron Chambers.
Aaron Rowand grounds into double play, third baseman Daniel Descalso to second baseman Tyler Greene to first baseman Matt Adams. Donnie Murphy out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Erik Komatsu replaces right fielder Skip Schumaker, batting 1st, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Shane Robinson replaces center fielder Jon Jay, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Jackson replaces shortstop Alex Cora, batting 9th, playing shortstop.
Pitcher Change: Nick Greenwood replaces Trevor Rosenthal.
Matt Dominguez flies out to left fielder Adron Chambers.
Scott Cousins strikes out swinging.
Greg Dobbs doubles (2) on a ground ball to right fielder Erik Komatsu.
Terry Tiffee grounds out, shortstop Ryan Jackson to first baseman Matt Adams.

Defensive Substitution: Mark Hamilton replaces first baseman Matt Adams, batting 6th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Eugenio Velez replaces second baseman Tyler Greene, batting 7th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Matt Carpenter replaces third baseman Daniel Descalso, batting 8th, playing third base.

Kevin Mattison walks.

Zack Cox remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Victor Marte replaces R. J. Swindle.

Kyle Jensen strikes out swinging.

Carlos Beltran grounds out, shortstop Donnie Murphy to first baseman Gaby Sanchez.

Matt Adams singles on a line drive to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Tyler Greene doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Bryan Petersen. Matt Adams to 3rd.
Daniel Descalso walks.
Pitcher Change: Wade LeBlanc replaces Josh Johnson.
Alex Cora flies out to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton.
Skip Schumaker reaches on fielding error by right fielder Giancarlo Stanton. Skip Schumaker to 2nd.
Jon Jay lines out to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton.
Matt Holliday grounds out, second baseman Nick Green to first baseman Gaby Sanchez. Skip Schumaker to 3rd.

Daniel Descalso strikes out swinging.
Alex Cora walks.
Skip Schumaker grounds out softly, first baseman Terry Tiffee to pitcher Chad Gaudin. Alex Cora to 2nd.
With Jon Jay batting, Alex Cora steals (1) 3rd base.
Jon Jay walks.
Adron Chambers walks. Jon Jay to 2nd.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Steven Hill replaces Erik Komatsu.
Steven Hill singles on a line drive to center fielder Kevin Mattison. Matt Carpenter scores. Kolten Wong to 2nd.
